name: Fortuna Health
headline: TurboTax for Medicaid
description:
Fortuna is a one-stop solution that helps consumers navigate Medicaid end-to-end from eligibility and enrollment to renewing coverage. 

Our platform creates value as the middleware layer for the $800B Medicaid ecosystem.

founders.name: Nikita Singareddy, Founder
founders.description: Building the TurboTax for 90M Americans on Medicaid. Did things at Truepill, a16z, RRE Ventures, and Oscar Health.

# Medicaid made easy
Navigating Medicaid for consumers is always fast, simple, and digital with Fortuna.
## Partner with Fortuna
Submit your information and our team will get back to you about Medicaid navigation.

## Partner with Fortuna
Submit your information and our team will get back to you about Medicaid navigation.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6601ca552e1699f0788d0806_Frame%20116046332.svg)
##  Eligibility checks in as little as 30 seconds
No complicated forms and sign ups - just a fast screening for government coverage.
## Fast enrollment and renewal
Smart, guided enrollment and renewal for the right Medicaid programs.
## Never miss an action
Always up-to-date on account status with notifications for every important admin action.
## Outstanding results and outcomes
We meet Medicaid consumers where they are - regardless of circumstances and barriers to coverage.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6722bc12332b6097debf2ea1_material-symbols_dashboard-outline.png)
### 5x faster Medicaid experience
Consumers deserve a simple Medicaid experience. Fortuna’s dynamic enrollment by state, program, and household situation speeds up time-to-enrollment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6722bc1280a58bcfbb92ca04_cuida_radar-outline.png)
### 15% increase in renewal rates
Fortuna’s personalized engagement, custom tool tips, and guided, end-to-end process makes renewals easier. 52% of users completing their actions the same day.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6722bc1260a82653f46bbd60_stash_wand-light.png)
### Closed loop reporting with full visibility
See the whole picture. Fortuna’s reporting gives partners comprehensive data the entire eligibility, enrollment, and renewal funnel.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6722bc12cbb0d44ab32291fc_mynaui_click.png)
### 95% application approval
Every application counts. With Fortuna’s 24/7 support, virtual mailbox, and multilingual assistance, even the most complex enrollments and renewals are handled from start to finish.
## Why consumers love Fortuna
No more paper Medicaid forms, long call wait times, and lost recertification notices.
![Phone outline](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/65f4a1834e092775d87167af_Pixel%207.svg)
![Steps 1, 2, 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6779778dc3156ee8fe96182a_Digital.svg)
### Simple, fast, digital experience
Tailored to consumer situations
![Phone outline](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/65f4a1834e092775d87167af_Pixel%207.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/6779780669f3a0277518e741_Language.svg)
### Multilingual live navigation
Available 24/7 for consumers 
![Phone outline](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/65f4a1834e092775d87167af_Pixel%207.svg)
![Man receiving a notification on phone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/67797888ca2758e3a277dc9b_Notifications.svg)
###  Stay up-to-date 
With communications and actions - handled by Fortuna
## Still have questions?
Medicaid and state-sponsored health insurance can be confusing so we’ve tried in plain language to answer common questions.
#### What is the difference between Medicare and Medicaid ?
Medicare is health insurance that generally covers people aged 65+. Medicaid covers people of all ages if you make below a certain income or face hardship based on other circumstances like disability.
Fortuna focuses on Medicaid. If you need Medicare support, we can help you dual-enroll. 
#### Can I use Fortuna to renew Medicaid coverage?
Yes. We make it easy to renew on Medicaid. With a dedicated, licensed navigator and our automations, never miss a Medicaid-related notification from the state or county.
#### Why apply through Fortuna Health?ﾠ
Filling out government forms can be confusing and stressful. And with the state working overtime to keep their websites and team running, glitches and lags in the system are understandable.
We built Fortuna so that you don’t need to deal with that. Spend 10 minutes working on your enrollment and even less with renewals. We take care of the rest with the state.
#### Do I need to come to Fortuna through an insurance company or doctor?
Yes, Fortuna is only available through providers and insurers. Please contact us at help@fortunahealth.com for more information.
#### What is Medicaid ?
Medicaid is $0 or low-cost health insurance covered by the government. Eligibility varies by factors like state, household size, and income.
#### How do I apply for Medicaid ?
Anyone can apply for Medicaid directly with the state or with the help of licensed healthcare navigators like Fortuna.
[Get started here](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/app.fortunahealth.com/eligibility>)
#### Why trust Fortuna?
Every Fortuna navigator is certified and licensed to enroll. Our platform is built for and by Medicaid members based on our lived experiences, with multilingual support.
Show full list of questions
## Are you a business that wants to offer Medicaid navigation?
See how providing consumers with Medicaid enrollment and renewal can improve revenue and decrease care gaps.
[Health Plans](https://fortunahealth.com/</health-plans>)[Providers](https://fortunahealth.com/</providers>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/64b0599f24dd751863cbe65b_Group%204.png)](https://fortunahealth.com/</>)
[Terms of Service](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/app.fortunahealth.com/tos>)[Privacy Policy](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/app.fortunahealth.com/privacy-policy>)[Security](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/www.fortunahealth.com/security-policy>)[System Status](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/status.fortunahealth.com>)help@fortunahealth.com
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/64daa9b2f826137d74651bae_HIPAA%20Vanta.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/65dfb61d0d1e64d54d0b4512_Vanta_Compliance_SOC%202%20\(1\).png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/64b1635686e5bb441d771e85_linkedin-2-icon-11-256.png)](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/fortuna-health/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/64ad76009abfb265fd8f5a00_31%20Twitter.svg)](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/twitter.com/hifortunahealth>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644edae40aef43dacc33caad/64ad76004b6011e52720fde1_32%20Facebook.svg)](https://fortunahealth.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/fortunahealth>)

generated_description:
**Fortuna Health: Simplifying Medicaid Navigation**

Fortuna Health is a fresh player on the healthcare scene, founded in 2023 and operating out of New York as part of the Y Combinator S23 batch. With just a lean team of six, Fortuna aims to be the "TurboTax for Medicaid," offering a comprehensive one-stop solution for Medicaid navigation—from checking eligibility and enrollment to coverage renewal.

**What They Do**

In an $800 billion Medicaid ecosystem, Fortuna acts as crucial middleware that streamlines the Medicaid experience. Their digital platform ensures that navigating Medicaid is not just easier but also significantly more efficient. Users can complete eligibility checks in as little as 30 seconds without the headache of complicated forms. Fortuna offers guided enrollment and renewal processes tailored to consumers’ unique situations, which means that everything operates much faster and with far fewer barriers.

With a 95% application approval rate, Fortuna enhances consumer experience by removing the traditional friction involved in Medicaid processes. They utilize dynamic state-specific enrollment and provide multilingual support around the clock, making Medicaid accessible to everyone, regardless of their circumstances.

**Key Features**

- **Fast Eligibility Checks**: Users can get speedy screenings for government coverage without complicated steps.
- **Efficient Enrollment/Renewal**: A well-designed interface guides users through the necessary administrative tasks seamlessly.
- **Real-Time Notifications**: Fortuna keeps users updated on their application status, ensuring they never miss an important action.
- **Personalized Engagement**: By providing tailored interactions and tools, Fortuna has significantly ramped up renewal rates, with 52% of users completing their tasks the same day.

**Why Fortuna Stands Out**

Fortuna Health is more than just a software solution; it’s built by and for people who have experienced the challenges of navigating Medicaid. They understand the pain points—no one wants to deal with endless paperwork or wait times on hold. By providing a simpler, faster, and more digital experience, Fortuna makes it easy for consumers to access their benefits without unnecessary stress.

**Partnership Opportunities**

Fortuna also welcomes collaboration with health plans and providers interested in offering their clients a smoother Medicaid experience. Their approach can not only improve consumer satisfaction but also contribute positively to bottom lines by minimizing care gaps.

In summary, Fortuna Health is poised to transform the way people interact with Medicaid by making the process efficient and user-friendly. With their innovative tech, they are meeting consumers where they are and simplifying what has traditionally been a confusing and cumbersome experience. For more information, visit their [website](https://fortunahealth.com/).
